data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Tawang, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tawang, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 4,787 who are far from you in Tawang, Arunachal Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of Tawang.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 54 believers in Tawang to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Dakpa people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Dakpa people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Dakpa people is yours.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Tawang. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Tawang.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Tawang, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

location.name: Tawang
location.people_groups_list: Khampa Eastern, Bilaspuri, Bhotia Tibetan, Sartang, Bania Brittal
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Khampa Eastern (900), Bilaspuri (1,100), Bhotia Tibetan (3,300), Sartang (3,400), Bania Brittal (52,000)
